oai_dc:dc.dc:title: AN EFFICIENT AND ROBUST GPGPU-BASED SHALLOW WATER MODEL
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mihami, Fatima-zahra
Roeber, Volker
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present an efficient and robust numerical model for the solution of the Shallow Water Equations with the objective to develop the numerical foundation for an advanced free surface flow solver. The numerical solution is based on an explicit Finite Volume scheme on a staggered grid to ensure the conservation of mass and momentum across flow discontinuities and wet-dry transitions. This leads to an accurate numerical solution at low computational cost without the need for Riemann solvers. The efficiency of the lean numerical structure is further optimized through a CUDA-GPU implementation.Recorded Presentation from the vICCE (YouTube Link): https://youtu.be/xMnK_r7Tj1Q
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 36v (2020): Proceedings of virtual Conference on Coastal Engineering, 2020; waves.47
